alert.note: Alert for Keith; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Perkins and Keith Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers with a few embedded thunderstorms extending from near Lewellen to 6 miles northwest of Lamar. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Grant, Brule, Madrid, Elsie, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Ruthon, Clear Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Brandon, Nevens, Megeath, Broganville, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground, Wild Horse Spring and Belmar. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 56 and 108. Highway 92 between mile markers 120 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 110 and 142. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
